Consultation
Perhaps the greatest benefit of membership is
the privilege of calling on ASAE for substanti¬
ated information whenever you are confronted
with management problems; the best thinking
of its members is thus constantly available to
you by the simple means of a letter, telegram,
telephone or personal call. ASAE becomes your
indispensable right arm—ready to aid you when
aid is needed.
Placement
ASAE maintains an extensive file of resumes
of individuals with high qualifications in associa¬
tion management. The resumes are referred to
associations seeking qualified individuals to serve
on their staffs. No charge is made for this service.
Insurance
Members of ASAE, and their staffs, are eligi¬
ble for three types of insurance; 1.) life insurance
at inexpensive group rates; 2.) a retirement plan
providing maximum retirement income under
the benefits of ASAE’s master trust, and 3.) 24
hour accidental death and dismemberment cover¬
age at extremely low rates.
